message: Abbreviation in name 'UserServiceTGImpl' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
Abbreviation in name 'userDAO' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
At-clause should have a non-empty description.
Local variable name 'p' must match pattern '^[a-z][a-z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Local variable name 'uResp' must match pattern '^[a-z][a-z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
First sentence of Javadoc is incomplete (period is missing) or not present.

Distance between variable 'currentName' declaration and its first usage is 4, but allowed 3.  Consider making that variable final if you still need to store its value in advance (before method calls that might have side effects on the original value).

Distance between variable 'plusName' declaration and its first usage is 4, but allowed 3.  Consider making that variable final if you still need to store its value in advance (before method calls that might have side effects on the original value).
Abbreviation in name 'fillTGUserData' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.

Distance between variable 'userPhoto' declaration and its first usage is 4, but allowed 3.  Consider making that variable final if you still need to store its value in advance (before method calls that might have side effects on the original value).
Unable to get class information for @throws tag 'BadRequestException'.
Unable to get class information for @throws tag 'NotFoundException'.
Local variable name 'uResp' must match pattern '^[a-z][a-z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
